name: Black Sea Drake Full
description: Dynamic flappy-like game for children and adults in minimalistic style, will go even on weaks systems with android higher than 2.2. Sense of game -is a set of the greatest possible points asterisks. For this purpose it will be required to accept quickly right actions, and it will be difficult! Evade from enemies who aim to eat you, collect sea asterisks, and the main thing - constantly watch oxygen level under water! Game will hold you in tenacious paws of passion, effectively killing your free time.
